==Summary==
The fragment of this letter to [[Allen and Unwin|Allen & Unwin]] that [[Christopher Tolkien]] and [[Humphrey Carpenter]] chose to include consists of only two sentences: "When is [[The Return of the King|Vol. III]] likely now to appear? I shall be murdered if something does not happen soon."
==Notes==
* ''[[The Return of the King]]'' was published on [[20 October|October 20]], [[1955]]. 
* Tolkien wasn't murdered.
